text: before you click the skip add button
just hear me out for 30 seconds
do you struggle to speak english clearly
you possibly know all the grammar rules
but still your english doesn't sound
fluent
do you find it hard to pronounce english
words with the right stress and accent
you know english well but still your
english doesn't sound that fluent it has
that mother tongue influence in short
mti and you hesitate to speak english
confidently are you afraid that you
might pronounce words wrong and cause
embarrassment to yourself if you want to
improve your communication skills and
speak english with correct pronunciation
and accent i have a wonderful accent and
pronunciation self-training program for
you this is the most simplified and
comprehensive english pronunciation
program ever created i'm radhan a
cambridge university certified linguist
with over 10 years of experience
teaching people to speak immaculate
english
join me on this journey to improve your
english communication skills faster and
better
